author: Special Correspondent
text:
It was awards galore during the inspection of Vashistha Johri, General Manager, Southern Railway, of the railway stations in the Salem – Namakkal – Karur section and other railway establishments on Thursday.

The General Manager distributed Rs. 1.38 lakh as special award to the station managers and other staff of the railway stations in appreciation of the proper upkeep of the station premises and the surrounding areas.

After inspecting the Mallur, Rasipuram, Namakkal and Mohanur railway stations, he gave away cash awards to the respective station managers and the subordinate staff separately for the proper and clean maintenance of the station premises and other properties. Track inspectors and gatekeepers also got cash awards.
title: Cash awards distributed
